mapper.update:
UPDATE toa_archive_version set
BACK_UP_ID = #{backUpId},
FOLDER_ID = #{folderId},
DOC_STATE = #{docState},
FILE_TYPE = #{fileType},
CONTENT_TYPE = #{contentType},
MODEL = #{model},
collect_ID = #{collectId},
DM_LINK = #{dmLink},
DM_NAME = #{dmName},
DM_ALIAS = #{dmAlias},
DM_LOCK_STATUS = #{dmLockStatus},
Physical_PATH = #{physicalPath},
DM_DIR = #{dmDir},
DM_TYPE = #{dmType},
DM_SUFFIX = #{dmSuffix},
WEIGHT = #{weight},
KM_TITLE = #{kmTitle},
DM_IN_RECYCLE = #{dmInRecycle},
KEY_WORDS = #{keyWords},
PERMISSION_VALUE = #{permissionValue},
AUTHOR = #{author},
CURRENT_VERSION = #{currentVersion},
VERSION_DESC=#{versionDesc},
DM_SIZE = #{dmSize},
SEQ = #{seq},
IS_VALID = #{isValid},
PI_ID = #{piId},
OPEN_DATE = #{openDate},
KM_END_TIME = #{kmEndTime},
KM_KEEP_TIME = #{kmKeepTime},
KM_REMIND = #{kmRemind},
KM_CONTENT = #{kmContent},
KM_CLICK_NUM = #{kmClickNum},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
IS_CURRENT_USED=#{isCurrentUsed}
where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(t.CURRENT_VERSION) FROM TOA_ARCHIVE_VERSION t WHERE t.BACK_UP_ID=#{backUpId}
